explanation: [0-0] A game character with pink hair, wearing pink clothes, is standing in a room, holding a green sickle. There is a fallen character at his feet, emitting a faint green glow. The walls of the room are blue, and the bricks are grey. The floor is smooth and blue, reflecting the character's image. Above the character is a white light. There is also a white English subtitle in the middle of the screen.

[0-8] The pink-clothed character walks towards the camera. Then the perspective shifts to behind the character, who continues walking forward. Subsequently, the scene changes, and the character turns a corner, walking to the left.
